languages.text: В бою персонажу может понадобиться разное оружие — подготовьте его заранее. Зажмите {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы открыть инвентарь, и подготовьте разные комплекты оружия в окне экипировки. Чтобы изменить комплект оружия в бою, удерживайте {console_bind|Func01}. Смена комплектов оружия в бою не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действий{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В бою персонажу может понадобиться разное оружие — подготовьте его заранее. Зажмите {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы открыть инвентарь, и подготовьте разные комплекты оружия в окне экипировки. Чтобы изменить комплект оружия в бою, удерживайте {console_bind|Func01}. Смена комплектов оружия в бою не тратит очки действий.

languages.text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
languages.original_text: В бою персонажу может понадобиться разное оружие — подготовьте его заранее. Зажмите {console_bind|RightBottom}, чтобы открыть инвентарь, и подготовьте разные комплекты оружия в окне экипировки. Чтобы изменить комплект оружия в бою, удерживайте {console_bind|Func01}. Смена комплектов оружия в бою не тратит {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очки действий{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which you can prepare in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost action points.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost action points.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

languages.text:
Durante el combate, cabe la posibilidad de que un personaje necesite distintos tipos de armas, pero puedes prepararlas con antelación. Mantén {console_bind|RightBottom} para abrir el inventario y disponer varias configuraciones de armas. Mantén {console_bind|Func01} para cambiar a una configuración de armas distinta durante el combate.
El cambio de conjuntos de armas no consume {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Durante el combate, cabe la posibilidad de que un personaje necesite distintos tipos de armas, pero puedes prepararlas con antelación. Mantén {console_bind|RightBottom} para abrir el inventario y disponer varias configuraciones de armas. Mantén {console_bind|Func01} para cambiar a una configuración de armas distinta durante el combate.
El cambio de conjuntos de armas no consume {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.

languages.text:
戦闘では、キャラクターはさまざまな種類の武器を使う必要があるかもしれないが、それはあらかじめ用意しておくことができる。{console_bind|RightBottom}を長押してインベントリを開き、さまざまな武器セットを用意する。戦闘中に別の武器セットに切り替えるには、{console_bind|Func01}を長押しする。
戦闘中に武器セットを交換しても{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}は消費されない。
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘では、キャラクターはさまざまな種類の武器を使う必要があるかもしれないが、それはあらかじめ用意しておくことができる。{console_bind|RightBottom}を長押してインベントリを開き、さまざまな武器セットを用意する。戦闘中に別の武器セットに切り替えるには、{console_bind|Func01}を長押しする。
戦闘中に武器セットを交換しても{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}は消費されない。

languages.text:
在战斗中，您的角色可能需要各种不同种类的武器，您可以提前准备好这些武器。按住{console_bind|RightBottom}打开物品栏，准备不同的武器套装。若想在战斗中切换到其他武器套装，请按住{console_bind|Func01}。
在战斗中切换武器套装并不会耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
在战斗中，您的角色可能需要各种不同种类的武器，您可以提前准备好这些武器。按下{console_bind|RightBottom}打开物品栏，准备不同的武器套装。若想在战斗中切换到其他武器套装，请按住{console_bind|Func01}。
在战斗中切换武器套装并不会耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text:
Im Kampf kann es vorkommen, dass ein Charakter verschiedene Arten von Waffen benutzen muss, die vorab vorbereitet werden können. Halte {console_bind|RightBottom} gedrückt, um dein Inventar zu öffnen und verschiedene Waffensets vorzubereiten. Um im Kampf zu einem anderen Waffenset zu wechseln, halte {console_bind|Func01} gedrückt.
Das Wechseln von Waffensets im Kampf kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Im Kampf kann es vorkommen, dass ein Charakter verschiedene Arten von Waffen benutzen muss, die im Voraus vorbereitet werden können. Halte {console_bind|RightBottom} gedrückt, um dein Inventar zu öffnen und verschiedene Waffensets vorzubereiten. Um im Kampf zu einem anderen Waffenset zu wechseln, halte {console_bind|Func01} gedrückt.
Das Wechseln von Waffensets im Kampf kostet keine {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}.

languages.text:
Au combat, un personnage peut avoir besoin d'utiliser différents types d'armes et celles-ci peuvent être préparées à l'avance. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom} pour ouvrir votre inventaire et préparer différents ensembles d'armes. Pour changer d'arme en cours de combat, appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}.
Le changement d'ensemble d'armes en combat ne coûte pas de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au combat, un personnage peut avoir besoin d'utiliser différents types d'armes et celles-ci peuvent être préparées à l'avance. Appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|RightBottom} pour ouvrir votre inventaire et préparer différents ensembles d'armes. Pour changer d'arme en cours de combat, appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01}.
Le changement de set d'armes en combat ne coûte pas de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g}.

languages.text:
Çatışmada bir karakterin farklı silah türlerini kullanması gerekebilir. Bu silahları önceden hazır etmek mümkündür. {console_bind|RightBottom} düğmesini basılı tutarak envanterini aç ve farklı silah setleri hazırla. Çatışmada farklı bir silah setine geçmek için {console_bind|Func01} düğmesini basılı tut.
Çatışma sırasında silah seti değiştirmek {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} harcamaz.
languages.original_text:
In combat, a character may need to use different kinds of weapons, which can be prepared in advance. Hold {console_bind|RightBottom} to open your inventory and prepare different weapon sets. To switch to a different weapon set in combat, hold {console_bind|Func01}.
Swapping weapon sets in combat does not cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.
